thread.title: Huge, Clean Suite near Wall Street
thread.title_full: Huge, Clean Suite near Wall Street - Review of Q&A Residential Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Wayne D
title: Huge, Clean Suite near Wall Street
text:
My girlfriend and I stayed overnight and was amazed at how big the suite was. It was like a giant studio. My only con is that we can easily hear other people outside of the hallway but overall we had a great stay. I would come back only for the suite.
Room Tip: Suite offers full kitchen which was a wow See more room tips
